title: [Large-Scale] IDT Design Studio-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A focus on math education content production by integrating design studio methodologies across diverse academic disciplines.

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively design teachable instructional models applicable to actual math classes using a design studio approach.
Learners integrate design studio techniques from other disciplines into the IDT process to propose creative educational solutions.
Learners create and evaluate at least three instructional materials visualizing math concepts using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
